'I share that desire, as do many of my people.'

'But I wish to have peace with the Sokhûri, and that is my command.'
'Let there be forgiveness between our peoples, and friendship.'
'My lord, the recent battle resulted in the deaths of many.'
'Beregond, you have been brought here to be judged for your crimes.'

'These are men and women of Gondor and of Rohan.'

'But there were others left in our care as a result of the battle's ending.'
'During the battle for the city, you left your post without leave.'
'What shall be done with the Khundolar prisoners?'
'You drew your sword and spilled blood in the Hallows, which is forbidden.'
'Thank you, my lord.'
Malthengil has asked you to deliver your report of Mordor to King Elessar, but first there are some matters on which the king must rule.
'In Gondor of old, the penalty for these crimes was death.'
'Do you understand?'

'But I deem that the penalty will be countered by your valour in the recent battle.'
